      Ajoute une couche symbolisee a la fin de la liste des couches symbolisees e afficher
      void addToGeometriesPool(Collection<IGeometry> geoms, Color colour, int widthPixels)
      Add several symbolised geometries to the pool layer, with a symbolisation such that: if the geometry is a point, it is drawn as a "+" cross; if it is a line, it is drawn with the colour and width in parameters; if it is a polygon, its border is drawn with the colour and width in parameter and it is filled with the same colour but semi-transparent.
      void addToGeometriesPool(Collection<IGeometry> geoms, Symbolisation symbolisation)
      Add several symbolised geometries to the pool layer, all with the same symbolisation
      void addToGeometriesPool(IGeometry geom)
      Add a red geometry to the pool layer
      void addToGeometriesPool(IGeometry[] geoms, Color[] colours, int[] widthsPixels)
      Add several symbolised geometries to the pool layer, with a symbolisation such that for each geometry: if the geometry is a point, it is drawn as a "+" cross; if it is a line, it is drawn with the colour and width in parameters; if it is a polygon, its border is drawn with the colour and width in parameter and it is filled with the same colour but semi-transparent.
      void addToGeometriesPool(IGeometry geom, Color colour)
      Add a coloured geometry to the pool layer
      void addToGeometriesPool(IGeometry geom, Color colour, int widthPixels)
      Add a symbolised geometry to the pool layer, with a symbolisation such that: if the geometry is a point, it is drawn as a "+" cross; if it is a line, it is drawn with the colour and width in parameters; if it is a polygon, its border is drawn with the colour and width in parameter and it is filled with the same colour but semi-transparent.

      • addToGeometriesPool

        public void addToGeometriesPool(IGeometry geom,
                                Symbolisation symbolisation)
        Add a symbolised geometry to the pool layer
        Parameters:
        geom - the geom to add
        symbolisation - the associated Symbolisation - can be created with one of the static methods of the Symbolisation class

      • addToGeometriesPool

        public void addToGeometriesPool(Collection<IGeometry> geoms,
                                Symbolisation symbolisation)
        Add several symbolised geometries to the pool layer, all with the same symbolisation
        Parameters:
        geoms - the collection of geometries to add
        symbolisation - the associated Symbolisation - can be created with one of the static methods of the Symbolisation class

      • addToGeometriesPool

        public void addToGeometriesPool(IGeometry geom,
                                Color colour,
                                int widthPixels)
        Add a symbolised geometry to the pool layer, with a symbolisation such that: if the geometry is a point, it is drawn as a "+" cross; if it is a line, it is drawn with the colour and width in parameters; if it is a polygon, its border is drawn with the colour and width in parameter and it is filled with the same colour but semi-transparent.
        Parameters:
        geom - the geom to add
        colour - the colour with which the geometry will be drawn
        widthPixels - the width in pixels (width of the line, resp. the contour of the polygon, resp. the stokes of the "+" cross symbol on the point

      • addToGeometriesPool

        public void addToGeometriesPool(Collection<IGeometry> geoms,
                                Color colour,
                                int widthPixels)
        Add several symbolised geometries to the pool layer, with a symbolisation such that: if the geometry is a point, it is drawn as a "+" cross; if it is a line, it is drawn with the colour and width in parameters; if it is a polygon, its border is drawn with the colour and width in parameter and it is filled with the same colour but semi-transparent.
        Parameters:
        geoms - the collection of geoms to add
        colour - the colour with which the geometries will be drawn
        widthPixels - the width in pixels (width of the line, resp. the contour of the polygon, resp. the stokes of the "+" cross symbol on the point

      • addToGeometriesPool

        public void addToGeometriesPool(IGeometry[] geoms,
                                Color[] colours,
                                int[] widthsPixels)
        Add several symbolised geometries to the pool layer, with a symbolisation such that for each geometry: if the geometry is a point, it is drawn as a "+" cross; if it is a line, it is drawn with the colour and width in parameters; if it is a polygon, its border is drawn with the colour and width in parameter and it is filled with the same colour but semi-transparent.
        Parameters:
        geoms - the array of geometries to add
        colours - the colours with which the geometries will be drawn
        widthsPixels - the widths in pixels (widths of the line, resp. the contour of the polygon, resp. the stokes of the "+" cross symbol on the point

      • addLayer

        public LoadedLayer addLayer(IFeatureCollection<? extends IFeature> fc)
        Cree et ajoute une couche d'objets charges (depuis un fichier shp par exemple) a l'interface. Elle peut alors etre utilisee pour construire une couche symbolisee qui, elle, sera affichable dans l'interface
        Parameters:
        fc -
        Returns:
